name: Harsh Judgment
prereq: Vigilante Dedication; Member Of The Gray Gardeners
summary: You loudly declare the creature's life forfeit by your judgment
description:
Choose one creature you can see, and loudly declare the creature's life forfeit by your judgment. That creature becomes your condemned foe until they are defeated, you use Harsh Judgment  on a diferent creature, or the encounter ends. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to Seek your condemned foe and on Intimidation checks to Demoralize them.
